Class WaitlistService

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.WaitlistService
All Implemented Interfaces:
WaitlistServiceInterface
public class WaitlistService extends Object implements WaitlistServiceInterface
Service class for managing gym slot waitlists. Handles adding users to waitlists when slots are full and promoting them when bookings are cancelled.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Instantiates a new waitlist service and initializes the DAO.

      Specified by:
      getWaitlistPosition in interface WaitlistServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      slotId - the ID of the slot
      Returns:
      the position (1-based), or -1 if not found

      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot
      Returns:
